title: Please help me identify this font. Thanks in advance!
content:
I really need to figure this out soon. Thanks to anyone who can help.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen shot 2013-05-31 at 11.13.23 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108203907/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20shot%202013-05-31%20at%2011.13.23%20AM_0.png) | 22.39 KB |
author: GerBear5000

comments.content: Curlz is only used for P and H. All the other letters are set in [Whimsy](http://web.archive.org/web/20131108203907/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/imageclub/whimsy/).
Good eye Antonio, I just focused on the letters i knew to be Curlz.
